findings.title: ST - Stop Transactions
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to stop transactions for all users excluding the owner.

findings.title: ELFM - Exceed Limit Fees Manipulation
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to increase fees more than a reasonable percent (25%).

findings.title: BC - Blacklisted Contracts
findings.description: The contract owner has the authority to massively stop contacts from transactions.

findings.title: L01 - Public Function could be Declared External
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The code does not follow the Solidity naming convention.

findings.title: L07 - Missing Events Arithmetic
findings.description: There are functions that have no event emitted, making it difficult to track off-chain changes.

findings.title: L13 - Divide before Multiply Operation
findings.description: Performing divisions before multiplications may cause lose of prediction.
